solution_line_template: So he read a total of {pages_yesterday} + {pages_today} = <<{pages_yesterday}+{pages_today}={total_pages_two_days}>>{total_pages_two_days} pages in 2 days.
Thus, he should read {total_book_pages} - {total_pages_two_days} = <<{total_book_pages}-{total_pages_two_days}={pages_tomorrow}>>{pages_tomorrow} pages tomorrow.
